column4: I'm trying to do a dist upgrade from 8.04 to 9.04, but my system is not behaving as it says it would on the website
you can't just upgrade  8.04 to 9.04  you would have to go through 8.10 first
you have to  change something so it will let you upgrade to 8.10
you have to tell it that you wan't non LTS releases as well
